channel.title: I'm coming back with samples
channel.description:
Hello guys, im back
I haven't used this app for a very long time, mostly because I have a laptop now. Since I found out about samples in Auxy a week ago, I'd like to give back with a lot of bass patches and drums that I've made.
I can't really update Auxy unless I delete it and use a different account so I don't know if you can change the pitch of the sample and if you can stretch the sample into a desired bpm rate, so I'll stick to 160BPM and Gm key unless I find out more.
I'll be back with wav samples of many of the basses like in here: www.dropbox.com/s/z70qscfj3kf1n8e/bass3.mp3?dl=0

item.title: I'm coming back with samples
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
2 posts were merged into an existing topic: Post links to your free .wav samples here!

Read full topic
